parameters.name: AclEntryComment
parameters.description:
The remarks of the ACL entry.

It must be 2 to 100 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It must start with a letter.

parameters.name: AclEntryIp
parameters.description: The IPv6 address or IPv6 CIDR block that you want to add to the ACL entry, for example, 12XX:0:0:XXXX::0102 or 12XX:0:0:XXXX::/60.

parameters.name: AclId
parameters.description: The ID of the ACL to which you want to add the IP entry.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the ACL.
